title: Now's your best chance to see Mercury all year — Here's what you need to know
description: Mercury puts on its best evening show of 2026 this February, with bright views after sunset and a helpful crescent moon.
content: Mercury puts on its best evening show of 2026 this February, with bright views after sunset and a helpful crescent moon.
